stage1.description: Trigger Cryo, Hydro, Pyro and Electro Swirl Reactions at least once each within 2s (×1).

stage2.description: Trigger Cryo, Hydro, Pyro and Electro Swirl Reactions at least once each within 2s (×5).

stage3.description: Trigger Cryo, Hydro, Pyro and Electro Swirl Reactions at least once each within 2s (×10).
